```
$ sudo apt install libssl-dev # Debian / Ubuntu
$ curl -O http://www.haproxy.org/download/2.1/src/haproxy-2.1.8.tar.gz
$ tar -xf haproxy-2.1.8.tar.gz
$ cd haproxy-2.1.8
$ make -j4 TARGET=linux-glibc USE_ZLIB=yes USE_OPENSSL=yes
$ sudo make install
```
